title: Mung bean and tofu soup
ingredients: ['185g (6 1/2oz) dried mung beans', '900ml (1 1/2pt) vegetable bouillon or stock', '3 tablespoons sunflower oil', '1 medium onion, finely chopped', '1 large garlic clove, finely chopped', '1 teaspoon freshly grated root ginger', '1/2 teaspoon mild curry powder', '115g (4oz) tofu, chopped into 1cm cubes', 'freshly grated black pepper']
